entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
